edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class GyroscopeService

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.MetricService<Float>
      edu.nd.darts.cimon.GyroscopeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
SensorEventListener, ObservableUpdate
public final class GyroscopeService
extends MetricService<Float>
implements SensorEventListener

Monitoring service for gyroscope. Gyroscope metrics:

  • X - rotation around X-axis (rad/s)
  • Y - rotation around Y-axis (rad/s)
  • Z - rotation around Z-axis (rad/s)
  • Magnitude - magnitude of total rotation

Author:
darts
See Also:
MetricService

performUpdates

protected void performUpdates()
Description copied from class: MetricService
Perform updates and scheduling necessary after internal update of values. This method should be called or overridden following the internal update of values by all subclasses of MetricService. For example, this may be called at the end of MetricService.getMetricInfo() following the update of values.

Overrides:
performUpdates in class MetricService<Float>
